tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE FossilRecords (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  fossil_name STRING,
  fossil_type STRING,
  fossil_age INT,
  discovery_location STRING
);

CREATE TABLE ResearcherInfo (
  researcher_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  researcher_name STRING,
  researcher_email STRING,
  researcher_affiliation STRING,
  researcher_field STRING
);

CREATE TABLE ResearchPublications (
  publication_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  publication_title STRING,
  publication_date DATE,
  researcher_id UUID REFERENCES ResearcherInfo(researcher_id),
  fossil_id UUID REFERENCES FossilRecords(id)
);

CREATE TABLE FossilLocation (
  location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  latitude DECIMAL(10, 8) NOT NULL,
  longitude DECIMAL(11, 8) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE FossilSpecimen (
  specimen_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location_id INT NOT NULL,
  specimen_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  specimen_age INT NOT NULL,
  specimen_description TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES FossilLocation(location_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Researcher (
  researcher_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  researcher_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  researcher_email VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE,
  researcher_affiliation VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE ResearchPublication (
  publication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  researcher_id INT NOT NULL,
  publication_title VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL,
  publication_date DATE NOT NULL,
  publication_abstract TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (researcher_id) REFERENCES Researcher(researcher_id)
)

CREATE TABLE fossils (
  fossil_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  fossil_name VARCHAR(255),
  fossil_type VARCHAR(100),
  discovery_date DATE,
  discovery_location VARCHAR(255),
  researcher_id INT
)
